replies.message: He didn't break the color barrier in rap wtf?! and Outkast has the highest selling hip-hop album. Dude its fine if ur an Em fan boy but don't try and claim u know hip hop

LOVE this, I'm stealing it!😃

He wasn't the first white rapper and the beastie boys have been around Since the beginning but he def broke color barriers .. He was the first superstar power house in rap that wasn't black and now is at least considered In most arguments of best rappers ever .. Def most people's top 5.. 3 on my list lol .. There may have a been a few other white rappers but eminem is on another planet as any of them talent wise.

Who cares if he's mainstream??? That means he's more well known than those other wannabe rappers that try and make it but can't rap or make good music. Eminem is the best rapper hands down and this cypher is proof. Any argument you or anyone else has is irrelevant
